title: Credit risk rethought – The new data imperative
description: The Covid‑19 pandemic has caused a seismic shift in the world of credit risk analysis. As pressure mounts on business leaders, regulators and governments, the demand for robust, reliable, forward-looking credit risk information is at a premium. Faced with a burgeoning workload and complex economic picture, analysts need a new approach to counterparty credit risk. As a result, many are turning to qualitative data to support their assessments
